titleInfo.title: Motion Detection and Visual Orientation: A Combined Behavioral, Neuronal and Theoretical Analysis of the Fly's Visual System
Neural mechanisms of behavior: proceedings of the 2nd International Congress of Neuroethology, September 10 - 16, 1989

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Egelhaaf, Martin. 1989. “Motion Detection and Visual Orientation: A Combined Behavioral, Neuronal and Theoretical Analysis of the Fly's Visual System”. In Neural mechanisms of behavior: proceedings of the 2nd International Congress of Neuroethology, September 10 - 16, 1989, ed. Joachim Erber, 90-95. Stuttgart: Thieme.
